events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will start reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case to help guide you through the next steps of the engineering hiring process.
Your initial screening interview is scheduled to evaluate your technical knowledge and project experience in software development.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the initial screening interview; we look forward to speaking with you.
Your technical interview with our lead developer has been scheduled to further assess your engineering skills.
